verses.name: Galatians 6:1
verses.text: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

verses.name: Galatians 6:2
verses.text: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

verses.name: Galatians 6:3
verses.text: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.

verses.name: Galatians 6:4
verses.text: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.

verses.name: Galatians 6:5
verses.text: For every man shall bear his own burden.

verses.name: Galatians 6:6
verses.text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.

verses.name: Galatians 6:7
verses.text: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

verses.name: Galatians 6:8
verses.text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

verses.name: Galatians 6:9
verses.text: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

verses.name: Galatians 6:10
verses.text: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.

verses.name: Galatians 6:11
verses.text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.

verses.name: Galatians 6:12
verses.text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.

verses.name: Galatians 6:13
verses.text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.

verses.name: Galatians 6:14
verses.text: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

verses.name: Galatians 6:15
verses.text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.

verses.name: Galatians 6:16
verses.text: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

verses.name: Galatians 6:17
verses.text: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.

verses.name: Galatians 6:18
verses.text: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.  Unto the Galatians written from Rome.
